name: RICHCODE富豪密码
description:
Player's goal: achieving financial freedomThe sole goal of the player is to achieve financial freedom in every game and win the opponent. The way is to invest in projects so that the monthly income of the project exceeds your monthly expenses. Of course, you can win if your opponent goes bankruptPopulace > village tycoon > Town tycoon... - world richStep by step, you move from the countryside to the city, from the common people to the rich, different maps, different challenges, the higher the rank of the rich, the stronger your ability to invest, to be CEO.Auction trade > scissors stone cloth > battle of dark cardYou can auction an investment to an opponent, initiate a transaction, negotiate a price, and cooperate.
Business wars, such as battlefields, can also challenge challenges and grab assets.
Random dark cards, no one knows what card the other side is.
Unemployment, lawsuits, divorce, you will encounter real life.Single player -->2 confrontation-->play with friendsThe game supports the single-player mode and several-person confrontation mode, you can invite friends to play together, use your financial intelligence to carry out the pit abduction rampage each other, and ultimately win.
The more you play with this game, the more you have the thinking mode of the rich, the greater the chance of becoming a rich person.
Bless you, become the winner of life.
